author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ربّ را در کلّ ملاحظه نمائید چه که در کلّ آثار تجلّی این اسم مشهود است و تربیت کلّ منوط باو و تربیت هم
translation: He is really a believer in the Unity of God who recognizeth in each and every created thing the sign of the revelation of Him Who is the Eternal Truth, and not he who maintaineth that the creature is indistinguishable from the Creator.
